name: MTLStageInputOutputDescriptor
desc: An object that describes the input and output data of a function.

items.name: var attributes: MTLAttributeDescriptorArray
items.desc: An array that describes where and how to fetch data for the function.

items.name: var layouts: MTLBufferLayoutDescriptorArray
items.desc: An array that describes how data is fetched for the function.

items.name: var indexBufferIndex: Int
items.desc: The location of the index buffer for a compute function using indexed thread addressing.

items.name: var indexType: MTLIndexType
items.desc: The data type of the indices stored in the index buffer.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Resets the default state for the descriptor.
